Name: Season to Taste
Description: Spice the next action you play today twice.

Name: Slice and Dice
Description: Deal 2 damage divided as you choose between one or more enemies.

Name: Fill the Pot
Description:
Deal 2 damage to one enemy.
If this action was spiced, recover 3 vitality.

Name: Toss the Dough
Description:
Deal 2 Damage to one enemy.
Rotate one hero card on your field.

Name: Into the Oven
Description: Deal 4 damage to one enemy. If you are damaging an elite enemy, deal 8 damage instead.
